Name: Devil's Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Lemon predominates with the richness of port fighting to be heard.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Hugo R. Ensslin's 1917 Recipes for Mixed Drinks (2nd Edition) .
Nutrition: One serving of Devil's Cocktail contains 148 calories
